author: hwright
msg: Support peg revision syntax for 'svn copy'.
(svn_client_copy_item_t): New.  Contains copy information for a single source.
(svn_client_copy4):  Take an array of svn_client_copy_item_t as input.  Adjust
(svn_client__copy_pair_t): Add additional fields to support operational and
(path_driver_info_t): Add a source revision number member.
(path_driver_cb_func): Use the src revnum specific to the path, instead of
the one in the callback baton.
(repos_to_repos_copy, repos_to_wc_copy): Use the per-pair revnum, instead of
a revnum for the whole operation.  For each source, use
svn_client__repos_locations() to get the correct repository URL for the
(setup_copy): Accept an array of svn_client_copy_item_t and add checks for
peg revision sanity.  Adjust calls to individual copy functions.
(svn_client_copy4): Accept an array of svn_client_copy_t and pass it to
(svn_client_copy3): Create the correct array to pass to svn_client_copy3().
(svn_client_move5, svn_client_move): Create the correct array to pass to
Update to use peg revision syntax.
(update_schedule_add_dir): Update to use peg revision syntax.
(cat_avoids_false_identities): Update to use peg revision syntax.
(svn_cl__copy): Parse the peg revision for each source, and pass it to the
client library as part of a svn_client_copy_item_t.
